snippet.title: Evolution sim 'The Sapling': first look
snippet.description:
Sign up for the newsletter https://mailchi.mp/b85a701ccf0e/thesapling

The Sapling is a short simulation game where you design your own plants and animals, and put them in a world together. Or you turn on random mutations, and see what evolution does to your ecosystem!

Website http://thesaplinggame.com/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/997380/The_Sapling/
Itch: https://woseseltops.itch.io/thesapling
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/thesapling/379689
Kartridge: https://www.kartridge.com/games/Woseseltops/the-sapling
